Name: Brazilian Nail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A rift on the classic Rusty Nail using cachaça as the main base spirit with a hint of Scotch maintaining its lineage to the Drambuie Nail family.
History: Created in 2010 by Jamie Stephenson, Manchester, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Brazilian Nail contains 205 calories
